numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The graph shows a difference in admissions at elite colleges.
2. The graph compares legacy applicants and non-legacy applicants.
3. The graph also uses the income rank of the parents as a factor.
4. I am surprised that applicants with wealthier parents have a lower chance of acceptance.
5. I wonder why the income rank of the parents is a factor.
6. I wonder how scholarships play a role in admissions.
7. I wonder how financial aid plays a role in admissions.
8. This topic relates to me and my community.
9. My peers and I will soon go through the college admissions process.
10. It is important to know what factors admissions officers value.
